file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: API REST basado en Greenter - Facturación Electrónica.
  version: "1.3"
  title: Lycet API
  contact:
    name: Giancarlos Salas
    email: giansalex@gmail.com
tags:
  - name: invoice
    description: Facturas y Boletas
  - name: note
    description: Notas de Credito y Debito
  - name: summary
    description: Resumen Diario de Boletas
  - name: voided
    description: Comunicacion de Bajas
  - name: despatch
    description: Guía de Remisión
  - name: retention
    description: Comprobante de Retenciones
  - name: perception
    description: Comprobante de Percepciones
  - name: reversion
    description: Comunicacion de Reversiones
  - name: configuration
    description: Configuraciones
  - name: sale
    description: Ventas en General
security:
  - ApiToken: []
paths:
  /invoice/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - invoice
      summary: Enviar una Factura o Boleta
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendInvoice
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Invoice"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DocumentResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /invoice/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - invoice
      summary: Generar el XML de una factura o boleta
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getInvoiceXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Invoice"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /invoice/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - invoice
      summary: Generar el PDF de una factura o boleta
      description: Retorna el Pdf
      operationId: getInvoicePdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Invoice"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /note/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - note
      summary: Envia nota de credito o debito
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendNote
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Note"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DocumentResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /note/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - note
      summary: Generar el XML de una nota de crédito o débito
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getNoteXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Note"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /note/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - note
      summary: Generar el PDF de una nota de crédito o débito
      description: Retorna el PDF
      operationId: getNotePdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Invoice"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /summary/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - summary
      summary: Enviar una Resumen diario de Boletas
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendSummary
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Summary"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SummaryResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /summary/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - summary
      summary: Generar el XML de un resumen diario
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getSummaryXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Summary"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /summary/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - summary
      summary: Generar el PDF de un resumen diario
      description: Retorna el PDF
      operationId: getSummaryPdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Summary"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /summary/status:
    get:
      tags:
        - summary
      summary: Obtiene el estado del ticket
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getSummaryStatus
      parameters:
        - name: ticket
          in: query
          description: Ticket de Resumen diario
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ruc
          in: query
          description: RUC de empresa (Multiples Empresas)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/StatusResult"
  /voided/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Enviar una Comunicación de Bajas
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendVoided
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Voided"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SummaryResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /voided/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Generar el XML de una Comunicación de Bajas
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getVoidedXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Voided"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /voided/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Generar el PDF de una Comunicación de Bajas
      description: Retorna el PDF
      operationId: getVoidedPdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Voided"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /voided/status:
    get:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Obtiene el estado del ticket
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getVoidedStatus
      parameters:
        - name: ticket
          in: query
          description: Ticket de Comunicación de baja
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ruc
          in: query
          description: RUC de empresa (Multiples Empresas)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/StatusResult"
  /despatch/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - despatch
      summary: Enviar una Guía de Remisión
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendDespatch
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Despatch"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DocumentResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /despatch/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - despatch
      summary: Generar el XML de una Guía de Remisión
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getDespatchXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Despatch"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /despatch/Pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - despatch
      summary: Generar el Pdf de una Guía de Remisión
      description: Retorna el Pdf
      operationId: getDespatchPdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Despatch"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/Pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /retention/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - retention
      summary: Enviar un Comprobante de Retencion
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendRetention
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Retention"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DocumentResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /retention/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - retention
      summary: Generar el XML de un Comprobante de Retencion
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getRetentionXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Retention"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /retention/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - retention
      summary: Generar el pdf de un Comprobante de Retencion
      description: Retorna el pdf
      operationId: getRetentionpdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Retention"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /peception/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - perception
      summary: Enviar un Comprobante de Percepcion
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendPerception
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Perception"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/DocumentResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /peception/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - perception
      summary: Generar el XML de un Comprobante de Percepcion
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getPerceptionXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Perception"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /peception/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - perception
      summary: Generar el pdf de un Comprobante de Percepcion
      description: Retorna el pdf
      operationId: getPerceptionpdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Perception"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /reversion/send:
    post:
      tags:
        - reversion
      summary: Enviar un Resumen de Reversiones
      description: Retorna la respuesta de SUNAT y el XML firmado
      operationId: sendReversion
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Reversion"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/SummaryResponse"
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /reversion/xml:
    post:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Generar el XML de un Resumen de Reversiones
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getReversionXml
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Reversion"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            text/xml:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /reversion/pdf:
    post:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Generar el pdf de un Resumen de Reversiones
      description: Retorna el pdf
      operationId: getReversionpdf
      requestBody:
        $ref: "#/components/requestBodies/Reversion"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
        "400":
          description: Error de Validación
          content:
            application/pdf:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/ValidationResponse"
  /reversion/status:
    get:
      tags:
        - voided
      summary: Obtiene el estado del ticket
      description: Retorna el XML
      operationId: getReversionStatus
      parameters:
        - name: ticket
          in: query
          description: Ticket de Resumen de Reversiones
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ruc
          in: query
          description: RUC de empresa (Multiples Empresas)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/StatusResult"
  /configuration/:
    post:
      tags:
        - configuration
      summary: Guarda el certificado y logo
      description: Guarda archivos de configuración
      operationId: saveConfiguration
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/FilesData"
        description: archivos en base64
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
  /sale/qr:
    post:
      tags:
        - sale
      summary: Generar el QR de una Venta
      description: Retorna la imagen del QR
      operationId: getSaleQr
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/QrParameter"
        description: Comprobante
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Operacion exitosa
servers:
  - url: http://lycet.api/api/v1
  - url: https://lycet.api/api/v1
components:
  requestBodies:
    Note:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Note"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Invoice:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Invoice"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Summary:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Summary"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Voided:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Voided"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Despatch:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Despatch"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Retention:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Retention"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Perception:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Perception"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
    Reversion:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Reversion"
      description: Comprobante
      required: true
  securitySchemes:
    ApiToken:
      name: token
      type: apiKey
      in: query
      description: Api Token
  schemas:
    Address:
      type: object
      properties:
        ubigueo:
          type: string
        codigoPais:
          type: string
        departamento:
          type: string
        provincia:
          type: string
        distrito:
          type: string
        urbanizacion:
          type: string
        direccion:
          type: string
        codLocal:
          type: string
    Client:
      type: object
      properties:
        tipoDoc:
          type: string
        numDoc:
          type: string
        rznSocial:
          type: string
        address:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Address"
        email:
          type: string
        telephone:
          type: string
    Company:
      type: object
      properties:
        ruc:
          type: string
        razonSocial:
          type: string
        nombreComercial:
          type: string
        address:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Address"
        email:
          type: string
        telephone:
          type: string
    Charge:
      type: object
      properties:
        codTipo:
          type: string
        factor:
          type: string
        monto:
          type: number
          format: float
        montoBase:
          type: number
          format: float
    DetailAttribute:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
        fecInicio:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        fecFin:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        duracion:
          type: integer
    SaleDetail:
      type: object
      properties:
        unidad:
          type: string
        cantidad:
          type: number
          format: float
        codProducto:
          type: string
        codProdSunat:
          type: string
        codProdGS1:
          type: string
        descripcion:
          type: string
        mtoValorUnitario:
          type: number
          format: float
        descuento:
          type: number
          format: float
        igv:
          type: number
          format: float
        tipAfeIgv:
          type: string
        isc:
          type: number
          format: float
        tipSisIsc:
          type: string
        totalImpuestos:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoPrecioUnitario:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoValorVenta:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoValorGratuito:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoBaseIgv:
          type: number
          format: float
        porcentajeIgv:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoBaseIsc:
          type: number
          format: float
        porcentajeIsc:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoBaseOth:
          type: number
          format: float
        porcentajeOth:
          type: number
          format: float
        otroTributo:
          type: number
          format: float
        icbper:
          type: number
          format: float
        factorIcbper:
          type: number
          format: float
        cargos:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Charge"
        descuentos:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Charge"
        atributos:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DetailAttribute"
    Legend:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
    Document:
      type: object
      properties:
        tipoDoc:
          type: string
        nroDoc:
          type: string
    SalePerception:
      type: object
      properties:
        codReg:
          type: string
        porcentaje:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoBase:
          type: number
          format: float
        mto:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoTotal:
          type: number
          format: float
    Direction:
      type: object
      properties:
        ubigueo:
          type: string
        direccion:
          type: string
    EmbededDespatch:
      type: object
      properties:
        llegada:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Direction"
        partida:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Direction"
        transportista:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Client"
        nroLicencia:
          type: string
        transpPlaca:
          type: string
        transpCodeAuth:
          type: string
        transpMarca:
          type: string
        modTraslado:
          type: string
        pesoBruto:
          type: number
          format: float
        undPesoBruto:
          type: string
    Prepayment:
      type: object
      properties:
        tipoDocRel:
          type: string
        nroDocRel:
          type: string
        total:
          type: number
          format: float
    Detraction:
      type: object
      properties:
        percent:
          type: number
          format: float
        mount:
          type: number
          format: float
        ctaBanco:
          type: string
        codMedioPago:
          type: string
        codBienDetraccion:
          type: string
        valueRef:
          type: number
          format: float
    Invoice:
      type: object
      properties:
        tipoDoc:
          type: string
        serie:
          type: string
        correlativo:
          type: string
        fechaEmision:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        formaPago:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PaymentTerms"
        cuotas:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Cuota"
        client:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Client"
        company:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
        tipoMoneda:
          type: string
        sumOtrosCargos:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoOperGravadas:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoOperInafectas:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoOperExoneradas:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoOperExportacion:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoIGV:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoIGVGratuitas:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoISC:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoOtrosTributos:
          type: number
          format: float
        icbper:
          type: number
          format: float
        valorVenta:
          type: number
          format: float
        subTotal:
          type: number
          format: float
        mtoImpVenta:
          type: number
          format: float
        details:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/SaleDetail"
        legends:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Legend"
        guias:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Document"
        relDocs:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Document"
        observacion:
          type: string
        compra:
          type: string
